text: DZRD (981 kHz) Sonshine Radio is an AM radio station owned and operated by Sonshine Media Network International. The station's studio and transmitter are located along Catacadang Rd., Brgy. Bonuan Gueset, Dagupan City.DILG Pangasinan goes On-airBangus Festival Fun Run (Dagupan)NTA expands “Oras ni Mannalon ti Tabako” broadcast coverageDTI-Pangasinan to hold tax and business forum for MSMEs ==References== Category:Radio stations in Dagupan Category:Radio stations established in 1967 Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines
title: DZRD
